question: Who has been appointed the new chief justice of Madras High Court?
explanation: Justice Indira Banerjee has been appointed the new Chief Justice of Madras High Court. With this, Justice Banerjee would be the second woman next to Justice Kanta Kumari Bhatnagar (June â€“ November, 1992) to head the charted court. Prior to this appointment, Banerjee was a judge of the Delhi High Court.
